content: "Create an outline for a blog post on the topic of 'The Benefits of Meditation for Mental Health'. The outline should include the following sections: Introduction, What is Meditation, How Meditation Benefits Mental Health, Types of Meditation, How to Start a Meditation Practice, and Conclusion. Each section should have a brief description of what will be covered in that section. The overall tone of the blog post should be informative, persuasive and accessible to a general audience."
